entries.away_from_keyboard_automatic_time_many: You will automatically be set to away from keyboard status in %DI minutes of inactivity.
entries.away_from_keyboard_automatic_time_invali: The valid time range before away from keyboard status is automatically enabled is 0 - 30 minutes. A time of 0 disables automatic AFK status.
entries.away_from_keyboard_default_message: I am currently away from the keyboard.
entries.away_from_keyboard_off: You are no longer away from the keyboard.
entries.away_from_keyboard_on: You are now away from the keyboard.
entries.away_from_keyboard_automatic_disabled: Automatic away from keyboard status is disabled.
entries.away_from_keyboard_automatic_on: Your status is now automatically marked as away from keyboard.
entries.away_from_keyboard_automatic_off: Your status is no longer automatically marked as away from keyboard.
entries.away_from_keyboard_automatic_time_one: You will automatically be set to away from keyboard status in %DI minute of inactivity.
